\date{Apr 23, 2023}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{TN202303::doc}}


The following newsletter summaries the new features and maintenance updates that can be found in Virtel Release 4.61 @ update level 6023.


\chapter{Installation changes}
\label{\detokenize{TN202303:installation-changes}}
\sphinxstylestrong{5900 VIRTERM/Samplib changes}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
SAMPLIB TCT members: Changed BUFSIZE from 20000 to 32000

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5921 Correct Version number}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Update installation files with correct version number.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5944 Wrong DDNAME for SAMPTRSF in VSE installation}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
For VSE the DDNAME for the SAMPTRSF file is SAMPTRF

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5950 ARBOLOAD JCL OPTION Section}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
The ARBOLOAD JCL has a new OPTION section for including transactions CLI-03CO and W2H-03CO

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5976 Samplib changes}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
TCT                           Remove redundant VSAM options for US,FR and 01

\item {} 
ABROLOAD                  Separate out CLI-31U and CLI-31C

\item {} 
VIR4INST                  Update level no.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5974 ARBOLOAD Sample}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Timeout value reduced

\end{itemize}


\chapter{Migration considerations}
\label{\detokenize{TN202303:migration-considerations}}

\section{V4.61}
\label{\detokenize{TN202303:v4-61}}
\sphinxstylestrong{End of support for COMPATIBILITY mode}

The “COMPATIBILITY” mode for w2hparm, that was introduced in version 4.54 to provide seamless migration of V4.53 w2hparm to V4.54. w2hparm is no longer supported in V4.61. It is recommended to switch to “Option” mode before migrating to V4.61.

\sphinxstylestrong{Version support}

Versions of Virtel older than V4.59 are no longer supported. It is recommeded to migrate to V4.59 or higher.

\sphinxstylestrong{ARBO changes}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
There have been no changes to the ARBO which would require migration from V4.60 or V4.59. Customers who are migrating from older releases should review the “What’s new in Virtel V4.XX” newsletters to determine applicable migration actions for new distributed features. Depending on requirements not all actions may be applicable. These newsletters are available online at \sphinxurl{https://virtel.readthedocs.io/en/latest/}

\item {} 
LINE enhancement. LOCADDR2 and PARTNER2 keywords are deprecated in V4.61 VIRCONF. LOCADDR and PARTNER fields have been expanded to accommodate IPV6 addresses and DNS values upto 52 characters. ARBO files from V4.59 and V4.60 will still be usable with V4.61 with migration. It is recommended that you migrate you ARBO to V4.61 by unloading in V4.59 or V4.60 to create a SYSIN deck for input to V4.61 VIRCONF LOAD. Any LOCADDR2 or PARTNER2 fields will have to be removed and the extended field data moved to the corresponding LOCADDR and PARTNER fields prior to loading with V4.61 VIRCONF.

\end{itemize}


\chapter{Fixes, changes and new features}
\label{\detokenize{TN202303:fixes-changes-and-new-features}}

\section{Presentation}
\label{\detokenize{TN202303:presentation}}
\sphinxstylestrong{5887 APL support for Omegamon}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Improved Omegamon 3270 Enhanced APL support.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5888 minor Javascript updates}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct copy and paste implementation.

\item {} 
Add option of displaying the SYSNAME in the Virtel title bar.

\item {} 
Improved help panels.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5890 update backspace key to left arrow to settings panel}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Settings panel now supports backspace as left arrow.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5891 Security type 4. Expired password panel correction}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Changes have been made to support an expired password panel in the Security type 4 logic.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5892 Modified delete PF Key description on Virtel Rule List Panel}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Virtel Rule List panel, “Suppress” text replaced by “Delete”

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5895 Ctrl+S default logic amended}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Browser copy and paste functionality impacted by Ctrl+S code.

\end{itemize}

\begin{itemize}
\item {}

\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}

\section{Base Components}
\label{\detokenize{TN202303:base-components}}
\sphinxstylestrong{5893 VIRPLEX startup corrected}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Modification to support IPV6 protocol.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5894 VIRPLEX error after long poll response}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Avoid “Storage Exhaustion” due to inadvertent long poll storage reuse. Possible AbendS0C4.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5897 High CPU when using USERPARM and VSAMTYPE=READONLY}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct High CPU issue when using USERPARM with VIRHTML defined as READONLY

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5898 VIRIPA9I INITIALISATION FOR VIRTELXM (9-XMPASS)}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Message VIRIPA9I corrected to show correct Virtel version number.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5900 Updates to VIRTERM}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Increate BUFSIZE defualt value from 8192 to 32000. MVS only.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5901 Correct ABENDS0C4 in MEMDISPLAY command}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Default DSASIZE defaults to 1MB, which is too small. Message VIR0086E issued.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5903 VIRAPI error in 4.59}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
VIB deleted, destroying the VIRAPI control block. Corrected.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5904 USERPARM 100\% CPU at Virtel startup}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Logic updated to correctly handle VSAM key location searches.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5905 Update IND\$FILE Codepage limitation}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Codepage logic corrected. Code regressed following fix.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5908 Improve support for graphics escape characters}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct Graphic characters processing. Characters were being replaced base character set.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5909 Passphrase fix for NOMIXEDCASE environments}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Uppercase conversion was being performed on passphrase. This is incorrect.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5910/5893 VIRPLEX STARTUP INCORRECT IN VIRTEL 4.61}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct Virplex startup processing.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5912 allow setting minimum PASSPHRASE length}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Avoid ICH409I 283-024 Abend. Password and Passphrase lengths can be defined in TCT to set lengths for Passphrase.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5915 Support for dynamic SNAP message table}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
New feature. Messages can now be dynamically added to the SNAPMSG table. Maximum of 10 messages.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5916/25/30/38/42/84 LOCK= terminal support}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
LOCK= keyword in TCT for HTML terminals. Force users to re-enter password after LOCK period has expired.

\item {} 
Support ESC key as DISCONNECT

\item {} 
CANCEL bug when using SECU=1

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5922 Correct SILENCE(YES/NO) in VIRTERM macro}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct SILENCE= keyword logic in VIRTERM macro.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5927 Support unsolicited BINDS}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Support for applications which use unsolicited BIND in session setup. For example IBM Debugger.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5943 Fix S0C1 bug after VIR0010 DETACH}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Registers in an inactive terminal were reloaded from the TIOA following a call of a DETACH function in VIR0010. This resulted in a S0C1 Abend.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5945 Abend ASRA VIRHTTP}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
The abend is caused by Virtel not correctly processing a GET request that contains spaces in the URL.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5947 New TCT keyword LPKALIVE= LONG POLL KEEP ALIVE}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
The Long poll timeout can now be set through a TCT parameter.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5948 Enhancement to the RULE =HTFORWD IS or IS NOT option.}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Rule now supports a list of proxy server through the HTFORWD option.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5957 VirtelUserSignon= or USER-SIGNON-CODE data removed}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Prior to thus change user name and password were included in the (encrypted) VirtelUserSignon code.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5958 Fix bug in VIRSV REQUEST}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Error message VIRS125E MQSAEH34 VIRSV REQUEST ERROR - R15 : 0000080C. Number of NBCELL increased from 6 to 12.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5963/82 VSE abend on /READ on CLOSED session}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct bug in VIR0010

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5964/67/70/80 VIRCONF Updates}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Remove LOCADDR2 and PARTNER2 support. VIRCONF and ARBO fields now support larger fields for LOCADDR and PARTNER values in the LINE record.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5969 New Security type 5}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Implements a new Security type 5 for transaction which allows a user signon to bypass the security manager (e.g. RACF) if already connected with a valid VirtelUserSignon code.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5978 RTM Update}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct Response Time Monitor if time out occurs. Avoid Screen locked

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5979 VIRCONF Update}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Add ESTAE to VIRCONF to avoid bring down Virtel should VIRCONF abend in UNLOAD command.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5981 Performance Issue}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Possible Bad performance for VTAM applications

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5988 404 return code}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct Long Poll issue. A 404 return code is presented after a 304 LP0

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5990 403 return code}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct Signon Code. A 403 can occur if Signon box is cancelled

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{PF=DISCONNECT ignored}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
PF=DISCONNECT is ignored following a conflicting intermediary requests.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6000 VSE CSI TCP/IP stack error}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Provide support for Stack error x002e

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6001 Menu locked}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
if a menu is locked out, the User Signon Code should not work

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6004 Implement Auto startup feature}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Implement a startup auto message function and add new support to message table.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6005 USS table processing}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Default USSTAB is incorrect.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6006 STATS=SMF}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct B37 processing for STATS=SMF

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6007 Chrome Browser Error}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct a change in the implementation of (new Date).toLocaleTimeString() in Chrome

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6008 LastPage Error}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
No LastPage displayed after LOCK and TSO Timeout

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6010 Edge Browser Error}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Avoid blocking Virtel with EDGE in IE11 compatibility mode

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6013 Virtel Parameters}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Conflict between LPKALIVE= and LOCK= parameters

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6015 Virtel CPU loop}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
A CPU loop can occur following Telnet ping

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6023 Virtel ABEND S0C4}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
VirtelUserSignon= can cause a SC4 due to VUSC/cookie conflict

\end{itemize}

\newpage

\end{itemize}

\begin{itemize}
\item {}

\end{itemize}

\item {} 
Support for MAP\$ FROM-VARIABLE,JSON,VAR=

\end{itemize}

\section{Other Enhancements}
\label{\detokenize{TN202303:other-enhancements}}
\sphinxstylestrong{5907 UPLOAD fails}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Boundary processing corrected for VSR.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5937 AIEV Abend}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Remove AEIV Abend when ARBO is updated at a higher Virtel release. Now reported as a LENGTH ERROR.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5940 LOCADDR updates}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
When a DNS name is used as a LOCADDR= address it was capitalized and put in quotes. This has been removed.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5941 AXIOS UPLOAD corruption}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Data was corrupted after upload from AXIOS.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5956/62 AXIOS UPLOAD stalls}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Processes of chunked data improved to avoid stalling during upload.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5971 Update SSLSETUP in SAMPLIB}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Correct keysize in sample member

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5975 Update SMFREXX procedures in SAMPLIB}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
SMFPRINT and SMFPRNTL updated

\item {} 
REXX procedures SMFREXXP and SMFREXXL updated

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{5997 SAMPLIB Update}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Update ARBOLOAD Samplib Member. New resources added to allow password change.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxstylestrong{6021 SAMPLIB Update}
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Update SSLSETUP with new CipherSuites

\end{itemize}
